#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
long int rev(long int x);
int main()
{
    int a,count;
long int p,q,n;
scanf("%d",&a);
while(a--)
{
scanf("%ld",&n);
count=0;
while(1){
p=n+rev(n);
q=rev(p);
count++;
if(p==q)
break;
else
n=p;
}
printf("%d %ld\n",count,p);
}
return 0;
}
long int rev(long int x)
{
int y=0;
while(x>0)
{
y=y*10+(x%10);
x=x/10;
}
return y;
}
